content:
# I successfully harvested 10 stones, and my inventory now contains 22 wood and 10 stone. 
# With these resources, I can craft additional items, such as a stone furnace, which will be useful for smelting ores in the future.

# I will check the recipe for the stone furnace and then proceed to craft it.

stone_furnace_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Crafting one stone furnace
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking the inventory after crafting the stone furnace
